data.name: Galaxy Angels - Dakimakuras
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack includes the complete set of all four high resolution digital Dakimakura designs of the four main female characters of the Galaxy Angels game, created by Kopi Anget. The pack of dakimakuras will download to a directory within the game folder.

When playing the game, once this DLC is installed you will be able to view a mini preview of each dakimakura design and find a link to the game directory to easily locate the individual image files.

This DLC is included as part of the Deluxe Edition Bundle
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The DLC pack contains all digital dakimakuras of the characters from the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
